commands.name: lint
commands.description: This looks for the 'lint' npm-script in each package and executes it. The lint npm-scripts will lint the project sources with the associated linting tool defined inside the project itself.

commands.name: test
commands.description: This looks for the 'test' npm-script in each package and executes it. The test npm-scripts will run the defined test suite.

commands.name: format
commands.summary: Format each project sources with prettier
commands.description: This looks for the 'format' npm-script in each package and executes it. The format npm-scripts will format the project sources with prettier.

commands.name: format-check
commands.summary: Check each project sources for a proper format with prettier
commands.description: This looks for the 'format-check' npm-script in each package and executes it. The format-check npm-scripts will check the format of the project sources with prettier.
